subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|言|𠯑|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=word}}. The right component is not related to {{och-l|舌|tongue|id=2}}.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|話す|はなす}}: to speak
* {{ja-r|電話|でんわ}}: a [[telephone]]
* {{ja-r|電話を切る|でんわ を きる}}: to [[hang up]]
